entry.title: Extron Authorized Programmer - EAP
entry.content: We are pleased to announce our most recent certification as an Extron Authorized Programmer - EAP. If you need Global Scripter python programming to customize your Extron Pro Series controllers, we are certified to help.
entry.summary: Reynoldson Control is now a certified Extron Authorized Programmer.

entry.title: AMX Solutions Master - ASM
entry.content:
We are pleased to announce our most recent certification as an AMX Solutions Master - ASM. This is the highest honor within the College of AMX training program and recognizes individuals who are capable of integrating complete AMX solutions and technologies, made up of the following Harman Professional University certifications:

  • Harman Certified Control Professional - Programming (HCCP-P)
  • Harman Certified Control Professional - Design (HCCP-D)
  • Harman Certified Control Professional - Commissioning (HCCP-C)
  • Harman Certified Control Professional - Management (HCCP-M)
  • Harman Certified Control Professional - Integration (HCCP-I)
entry.summary: Reynoldson Control has been certified as an AMX Solutions Master (ASM).

entry.title: Extron Qualified Independent Programmer - EQIP
entry.content: We are pleased to announce our acceptance as an Extron Qualified Independent Programmer company. Thank you Extron for trusting our programming in partnership with your control system platform.
entry.summary: Reynoldson Control is now an Extron Qualified Independent Programmer company.

entry.title: Extron Control Professional - ECP
entry.content: We are pleased to announce our most recent certification as an Extron Control Professional - ECP. If you need Global Configurator Professional programming to customize your Extron Pro Series controllers, we are certified to help.
entry.summary: Reynoldson Control is now a certified Extron Control Professional.

entry.title: AMX Valued Independent Partner - VIP
entry.content: We are pleased to announce our acceptance into the AMX Valued Independent Partners program. Thank you AMX for trusting our programming in partnership with your control system platform.
entry.summary: Reynoldson Control has joined the AMX Valued Independent Partners program.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
This is the typical hello world that all programmers generate many times throughout their career. This is the culmination of hard work learning more about hexo, nodejs, npm, bootstrap, and github. That hard work results in a tool that generates this website - Reynoldson Control.

Why hexo?

  • Never again get burned by the loss of a CMS database.
  • Never again jump through hoops that the usual CMS requires.
  • No more waiting for database queries on a shared server.
  • Hey, I’m a developer. This can be fun and I can add a tool to my belt.
  • Write in markdown and generate html, sign me up!
  • I get to work with nodejs and npm.

Why bootstrap?

  • A website needs to be responsive and work on mobile devices.
  • It is more than just a grid system, it is a beautiful framework!
  • It comes with a grid, css, components, and plugins.
  • It allows me to continue to sharpen a skill that I enjoy.

Why github?

  • I can host this site for free!
  • Clone, write, deploy, commit!
  • I can separate a repository that generates a site from the actual site, whoah!
  • Github is social and let’s be honest I need the company.
  • I get to learn git.
entry.summary: My first hexo blog posting for www.reynoldsoncontrol.com.
